comment.author: 29876272@N07
comment._content:
This is a view looking north from the foot of Broadway (at Bowling Green), showing construction of the U.S. Customs's House .  

The building was designed by architect Cass Gilbert.  Construction began in 1900 and the building was completed in 1907.  So I would suggest that this photo was taken closer to the year 1900 - rather than the "ca. 1905" date given.
